subject: Golf
Ryder Cup (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Three of Paul Azinger’s six Ryder Cup rookies are in their 20s. Anthony Kim, 23; Hunter Mahan, 26; and J. B. Holmes, 26, have a lot riding on their young shoulders this week.
snippet: Three of Paul Azinger’s six Ryder Cup rookies are in their 20s. Anthony Kim, 23; Hunter Mahan, 26; and J. B. Holmes, 26, have a lot riding on their young shoulders this week.
